fields.label: Price / Discounts rules
fields.name: wctbp_period_rules
fields.instructions: Priority goes top to bottom. Top rules have higher priority.  Rules defined directly on product edit pages have HIGHER PRIORITY that the rules defined here.

sub_fields.label: Rule name / id
sub_fields.name: wctbp_rule_name_id
sub_fields.instructions: Type a numeric id or a title for the scheduling rule. This helps to better identify the rule.

sub_fields.label: Select products
sub_fields.name: wctbp_selected_products
sub_fields.instructions: NOTE: If no products and categories are selected, the pricing rule will be applied to all products.

sub_fields.label: Select product categories
sub_fields.name: wctbp_selected_product_categories
sub_fields.instructions: NOTE: If no products and categories are selected, the pricing rule will be applied to all products.

sub_fields.label: Assignment strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_selected_strategy
sub_fields.instructions: You can assign a scheduling rule to selected item(s)/category(ies) or to all excluding the selected ones.

sub_fields.label: Children categories
sub_fields.name: wctbp_categories_children
sub_fields.instructions: If at least one category has been selected, you can decide to apply the scheduling rule also to children categories items

choices.all_children: Apply to selected categories and all its children

sub_fields.label: Time periods
sub_fields.name: wctbp_time_period
sub_fields.instructions: Priority goes bottom to top. Lower rules have higher priority. When a date is reached, the selected post(s)/product(s) status will be setted according to selected "Status" option.

sub_fields.label: Prices / Discounts value
sub_fields.name: wctbp_prices_per_quantity
sub_fields.instructions:
Set prices/discounts strategies that will depend on item quantity on cart/stock. Strategies can be configured to change dynamically ITEM(s) price or to add a discount to the CART.

For each quantity range can be define only ONE [cart] and ONE [item] strategies. In case of stacking rules the lower one will have higher priority

NOTE: price manipualtion is performed before the taxes are applied to the item base price: The plugin manipulates the item base price and the taxes are calulated to the result.

sub_fields.label: Unique id
sub_fields.name: wctbp_unique_id
sub_fields.instructions: Ignore this field. It is used by the plugin for internal functions.

choices.percentage: [ITEM] The price will be a percentage of original price
choices.value_off: [ITEM] Subtract a fixed value from the item original price
choices.value_add: [ITEM] Add a fixed value to the item original price
choices.cart_fixed: [CART] Subtract  a fixed discount value to the cart total
choices.cart_fixed_add_fee: [CART] Add a fixed fee value to the cart total
choices.cart_percentage: [CART] Subtract discount percentage based on cart total
choices.cart_percentage_add_fee: [CART] Add fee percentage based on cart total
choices.cart_free_item: [CART] The selected number of items will be free

sub_fields.label: Price / Discount value
sub_fields.name: wctpb_price_value
sub_fields.instructions:
INFO If [ITEM] fixed price value has been selected, the following value will rapresent the price.

In case of [ITEM] percentage strategy, the price will be calculated as a percentage of the original price. Ex.: if you choose 40 (it means 40%) and the original price is 150$, the price will be 60$. If you choose 125, and the 150$, the final price will be 187,5$.

In case of [ITEM] subtract/add value the following value will be subtracted/added from the original price. Ex.: Item price is 100$ and the value is 20, the item price will be 80$

In case of [CART] fixed discount/fee if at least one of the items currently in the cart matches one of the selected items/categories, will be applied the following discount/added the setted value to the cart total.

In case of [CART] percentage discount/fee if at least one of the items currently in the cart matches one of the selected items/categories, will be applied the following percentage discount value/added he following value to the cart total (the discount/fee is applied ONLY one time and not for every matching item). Ex.: if you choose 40 for discount (it means 40%) and the current cart total is 150$, discount will be 60$.

sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.name: wctpb_cart_label
sub_fields.instructions: Text shown as Fee/Discount label on cart

sub_fields.label: Max fixed discount amount applicable
sub_fields.name: wctbp_max_discount_value_applicable
sub_fields.instructions:
In case of percentage discount, you can set a fixed maximum amount that will applied. For example: if you want that the applied discount has not excede 50$, set this value as 50.

Leave empty or 0 to ignore this option

sub_fields.label: Free shipping
sub_fields.name: wctbp_free_shipping
sub_fields.instructions: Selected items will setted as "virtual", so no additional shipping costs will added.

sub_fields.label: Number of free items
sub_fields.name: wctpb_number_of_free_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of items for which the user will not be charged.

sub_fields.label: Apply discount/fee value per each matching item
sub_fields.name: wctpb_apply_discount_value_per_each_matching_item
sub_fields.instructions: By default the discount/fee value is applied only once. Enabling this option the discout value will be applied for every matching item and its quantity.

sub_fields.label: Individual use only
sub_fields.name: wctbp_cart_discount_individual_use_only
sub_fields.instructions: If Yes value is selected, the configured cart discount cannot be used in conjunction with other cart discounts.

sub_fields.label: Give away strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_give_away_strategy
sub_fields.instructions:
Free item can be given for fixed cart quantity rangeor recursively every X item.

Cart quantity range example: Give 2 items for free if the user buys from 6 to 10 items.

Every X item example: Give 1 item for free every 5 items.

sub_fields.label: Min quantity/amount
sub_fields.name: wctpb_min_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: The specified value is included and used as lower extreme of the quantity range. Leave empty for no minimum value.

sub_fields.label: Max quantity/amount
sub_fields.name: wctpb_max_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: The specified value is included and used as higher extreme of the quantity range. Leave empty for no maximum value.

sub_fields.label: Which value has to be considered? (if any quantity/amount has been setted)
sub_fields.name: wctbp_quantity_strategy
sub_fields.instructions:
INFO Define the value has to be consider: Cart quantity (according to the Quantity/Amount value strategy), Stock left quantity, Amount spent per items (according to the Quantity/Amount value strategy) or Cart total.

NOTE: if Stock quantity is choosen and stock managment has not been enabled for an item, the rule will not be applied. Total sales, in case of variable products, considers the total sales of the master product (WooCommerce doesn't keep track of single variation sales). Total sales (total_sales) value can be edited by using the Custom fields meta box on product page.

sub_fields.label: Stack rule: apply pricing rule even if other have been applied?
sub_fields.name: wctbp_stack_rule
sub_fields.instructions:
It may happen that another pricing rule has been applied to the product. In this case, would you like to apply this rule?

NOTE: the rule will be applied to the price already manipualted by other rules.

sub_fields.label: Ignore if a coupon has been applied
sub_fields.name: wctbp_ignore_rule_if_coupon_is_active
sub_fields.instructions: The pricing rules won't be applied in case at least one coupon has been applied.

sub_fields.label: Quantity/Amount value strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_cumulative_category_quantity
sub_fields.instructions:
INFO NOTE: For price rules which have The selected number of items will be free option as Price / Discount strategy, will be automatically applied the Single product quantity. Other values for this field will be ignored!!

Single product quantity: by default the plugin considers the single product quantity in cart to check if its price has to be adjusted or if the cart discount has to be aplied.

Quantity per each selected categories : the plugin will consider a quantity for each selected category (Select product category(ies) field) as sum of the products quantities belonging to that category (NOTE: Select product(s) field is ignored). Foreach category quantity matching a time period rule, the plugin will apply the discount/price adjustment to ALL products belonging to that category.

Example: time period rule min quantity: 3. Categories selected in category filter: Category1 and Category2. The customer during the shopping sessions adds 2xProduct1, 2xProduct2 (both belonging to Category1) and 1xProduct3 (belonging to Category2) to the cart. The plugin detects that the sum of the quantity for both Product1 and Product2 is 4 and for Product3 is 1. Therefore it applies the pricing rule only to Product1 and Products2 (and to all products that belongs to Category1).

Note: do not use this option with products belonging to multiple categories. The plugin will consider only the first category associated to it.

Sum of quantities for selected product and categories: The plugin will consider quantity as sum of quantities for selected products (Select product(s) field) and for products belonging to the selected categories (Select product category(ies) field). If the computed quantity matches a time period rule, discount/price adjustment will be applied to all the selected products and categories. Example: time period rule min quantity: 3. Category selected in category filter: Category1 and Product3. The customer during the shopping sessions adds 2xProduct1, 2xProduct2 (both belonging to Category1) and 1xProduct3 (belonging to Category2) to the cart. For al those product their quantity will be consideres as 6, therfore the rule will be applied to all of them.

choices.yes: Quantity per each selected categories (Select product(s) field is ignored)
choices.linked_products: Sum of all quantities for selected product and categories

sub_fields.label: User account
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_account
sub_fields.instructions: Select specific users to which apply price. Leave empty to apply to all users.

sub_fields.label: User roles
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_roles
sub_fields.instructions: Choose user role(s) to which apply price rules. Leave empty to apply to all users.

sub_fields.label: User filtering strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_roles_filtering_strategy
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the price rule has to be applied to all or except the selected role and selected users (if at least a role has been selected otherwise will be ignored).

choices.all: For all selected role(s) and user(s)
choices.except: Except the selected role(s) and user(s)

sub_fields.label: Hide price for unauthorized users
sub_fields.name: wctbp_hide_price_for_unauthorized_users
sub_fields.instructions:
Price will be hidden and the product(s) will be unpurchasable to unauthorized users in shop and product pages.

This option will not work for single product variation

This option could not work for some themes that are not properly using all the woocommerce actions to render the "add to cart" buttons.

sub_fields.label: Years
sub_fields.name: wctbp_years
sub_fields.instructions: Select a year. if empty scheduling rule will be applied to all years

sub_fields.label: Start hour
sub_fields.name: wctbp_start_hour
sub_fields.instructions: 24h hour format: 0 - 23

sub_fields.label: End hour
sub_fields.name: wctbp_end_hour
sub_fields.instructions: 24h hour format: 0 - 23

fields.label: Minutes offset
fields.name: wctbp_time_offset
fields.instructions: WooCommerce Pricing! uses server time to schedule posts. If server time is different from yours,  adjust the "Minutes offset" value to syncronize it with your time. If you don't know server time, use the widget added by this plugin in the Wordpress Dashboard

fields.label: Display "Sale" badge
fields.name: wctpb_display_sale_badge
fields.instructions: For items for which configured price is less than the original price will be displayed a Sale badge.

fields.label: Disable shop page ajax "add to cart" function
fields.name: wctpb_disable_shop_page_ajax_add_to_cart_function
fields.instructions: By default WooCommerce Pricing! disable the ajax "add to cart" function on shop page. This is done to force reload the page and refresh product page after an "add to cart" action, in this way the displayed priced can be updated according to the quantity currently in cart.

fields.label: Display old price
fields.name: wctpb_display_old_price
fields.instructions: By default the plugin will display old price with an line-throught on Shop and Product page.

fields.label: Alternative variable product price range display
fields.name: wctpb_use_alternative_variable_product_reange_price_display
fields.instructions: Display price as From {min_price}€ instead of {min_price}€ - {max_price}€

fields.label: Display items price without tax
fields.name: wctpb_display_items_price_without_tax
fields.instructions: WooCommerce Pricing! computes the new item price using the item base price and then appling item tax to the result. If you want to not include tax select "Yes".

fields.label: Apply taxes to fees
fields.name: wctpb_apply_tax_to_cart_discount
fields.instructions: Applies taxes to cart fees

fields.label: Product page - Disable live price display
fields.name: wctbp_disable_product_page_live_price_display
fields.instructions: On product page, item price will be automatically refreshed according the selected product quantity. Using this option you can disable this feature.

fields.label: Product page - display total price next to sinlge price
fields.name: wctbp_display_total_price_next_single_price
fields.instructions: Under the Product name, the plugin will display the total price (according the selected quantity) next to the product per unit.

fields.label: Product page - display discount percentage next to single price
fields.name: wctbp_display_discount_percentage_next_single_price
fields.instructions: A text displaying the discount percentage applied (or the fixed amount subtracted) will be displayed. Customize the text using the text menu

fields.label: Shop page - display discount percentage next to single price
fields.name: wctbp_shop_page_display_discount_percentage_next_single_price
fields.instructions: A text displaying the discount percentage applied (or the fixed amount subtracted) will be displayed. Customize the text using the text menu

fields.label: Cart and Checkout pages - Display "saved amount" on Item table
fields.name: wctbp_display_saved_amount_on_item_table
fields.instructions: Will be displayed a line with will show the total amount saved. This amount is the sum of the cart discount and product price reductions applied. The label of this line can be customized via the Text menu.

fields.label: Completely disable "Hide price for unauthorized users" feature
fields.name: wctbp_disable_hide_price_feature
fields.instructions: It may happen that some themes are not properly using WooCommerce actions to render the "add to cart" buttons on both shop and products page. This may cause duplication button rendering issue. If you are experiencing this kind of issue, completely disable the Hide price for unauthorized users by using this option.

fields.label: Configure time periods, quantities, prices and to which user roles apply
fields.name: wctbp_time_period
fields.instructions:
Priority goes top to bottom. Top rules have higher priority. When a date is reached, the selected post(s)/product(s) status will be setted according to selected "Status" option.
PRODUCT RULES have higher priority than general rules setted using the "WooCommerce Pricing! bulk editor"

sub_fields.label: Prices / Discounts
sub_fields.name: wctbp_prices_per_quantity
sub_fields.instructions:
Set prices/discounts strategies that will depend on item quantity on cart/stock. Strategies can be configured to change dynamically ITEM(s) price or to add a discount to the CART. For each quantity range can be define only ONE [cart] and ONE [item] strategies. In case of stacking rules the lower one will have higher priority

NOTE: price manipualtion is performed before the taxes are applied to the item base price: The plugin manipulates the item base price and the taxes are calulated to the result.

sub_fields.label: Unique id
sub_fields.name: wctbp_unique_id
sub_fields.instructions: Ignore this field. It is used by the plugin for internal functions.

choices.value_off: [ITEM] Subtract a fixed value from the item original price
choices.value_add: [ITEM] Add a fixed value to the item original price
choices.cart_fixed: [CART] Subtract  a fixed discount value to the cart total
choices.cart_fixed_add_fee: [CART] Add a fixed fee value to the cart total
choices.cart_percentage: [CART] Subtract  discount percentage based on cart total
choices.cart_percentage_add_fee: [CART] Add fee percentage based on cart total
choices.cart_free_item: [CART] The selected number of items will be free

sub_fields.label: Free shipping
sub_fields.name: wctbp_free_shipping
sub_fields.instructions: Selected items will setted as "virtual", so no additional shipping costs will added.

sub_fields.label: Number of free items
sub_fields.name: wctpb_number_of_free_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of items for which the user will not be charged.

sub_fields.label: Apply discount/fee value per each matching item
sub_fields.name: wctpb_apply_discount_value_per_each_matching_item
sub_fields.instructions: By default the discount/fee value is applied only once. Enabling this option the discout value will be applied for every matching item and its quantity.

sub_fields.label: Individual use only
sub_fields.name: wctbp_cart_discount_individual_use_only
sub_fields.instructions: If Yes value is selected, the configured cart discount cannot be used in conjunction with other cart discounts.

sub_fields.label: Give away strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_give_away_strategy
sub_fields.instructions:
Free item can be given for fixed cart quantity rangeor recursively every X item.

Cart quantity range example: Give 2 items for free if the user buys from 6 to 10 items.

Every X item example: Give 1 item for free every 5 items.

sub_fields.label: Min quantity/amount
sub_fields.name: wctpb_min_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: The specified value is included and used as lower extreme of the quantity range. Leave empty for no minimum value.

sub_fields.label: Max quantity/amount
sub_fields.name: wctpb_max_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: The specified value is included and used as higher extreme of the quantity range. Leave empty for no maximum value.

sub_fields.label: Which quantity has to be considered? (if any quantity has been setted)
sub_fields.name: wctbp_quantity_strategy
sub_fields.instructions:
INFO Define the value has to be consider: Cart item quantity, Stock left quantity, Amount spent for this item or Cart total.

NOTE: if Stock quantity is choosen and stock managment has not been enabled for an item, the rule will not be applied. Total sales, in case of variable products, considers the total sales of the master product (WooCommerce doesn't keep track of single variation sales). Total sales (total_sales) value can be edited by using the Custom fields meta box on product page.

sub_fields.label: Stack rule: apply pricing rule even if other have been applied?
sub_fields.name: wctbp_stack_rule
sub_fields.instructions:
It may happen that another pricing rule has been applied to the product. In this case, would you like to apply this rule?

NOTE: the rule will be applied to the price already manipualted by other rules.

sub_fields.label: Ignore if a coupon has been applied
sub_fields.name: wctbp_ignore_rule_if_coupon_is_active
sub_fields.instructions: The pricing rules won't be applied in case at least one coupon has been applied.

sub_fields.label: Select product variant(s) to which apply the rule.
sub_fields.name: wctb_selected_product_variants
sub_fields.instructions: Leave unselected to apply to all

sub_fields.label: User account
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_account
sub_fields.instructions: Select specific users to which apply price. Leave empty to apply to all users.

sub_fields.label: User roles
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_roles
sub_fields.instructions: Choose user role(s) to which apply price rules. Leave empty to apply to all users.

sub_fields.label: User filtering strategy
sub_fields.name: wctbp_user_roles_filtering_strategy
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the price rule has to be applied to all or except the selected role and selected users (if at least a role has been selected otherwise will be ignored).

choices.all: For all selected role(s) and user(s)
choices.except: Except the selected role(s) and user(s)

sub_fields.label: Hide price for unauthorized users
sub_fields.name: wctbp_hide_price_for_unauthorized_users
sub_fields.instructions:
Price will be hidden and the product(s) will be unpurchasable to unauthorized users in shop and product pages.

This option will not work for single product variation

This option could not work for some themes that are not properly using all the woocommerce actions to render the "add to cart" buttons.

sub_fields.label: Years
sub_fields.name: wctbp_years
sub_fields.instructions: Select a year. if empty scheduling rule will be applied to all years

sub_fields.label: Start hour
sub_fields.name: wctbp_start_hour
sub_fields.instructions: 24h hour format: 0 - 23

sub_fields.label: End hour
sub_fields.name: wctbp_end_hour
sub_fields.instructions: 24h hour format: 0 - 23

fields.label: Sale badge text
fields.name: wctbp_sale_badge_text
fields.instructions: Here you can customized the text displayed in the sale badge showed for product with custom pricing rules. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.
fields.placeholder: Leave empty to leave the default WooCommerce badge sale text

fields.label: Product page - after price text
fields.name: wctbp_product_page_after_price_text
fields.instructions: Textt is appended to the product price text if a pricing rule has been applied. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.

fields.label: Product page - before total price text
fields.name: wctbp_product_page_before_total_price_text
fields.instructions: Text showed after product price if a pricing rule has been applied and if the display total price next to sinlge price option has been enabled in the Genaral options menu. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.

fields.label: Product page - discount percentage/amount subtracted text
fields.name: wctbp_product_page_discount_percentage_text
fields.instructions:
Shows the discount applied/amount subtracted (if any) to the product after the product price. {value} is the place holder for the discount percentage applied/amount subtracted. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.

Example: {value} off!

fields.label: Shop page - discount percentage/amount subtracted text for simple product
fields.name: wctbp_shop_page_discount_percentage_text
fields.instructions:
Shows the discount applied/amount subtracted (if any) to the product after the product price. {value} is the place holder for the discount percentage applied/amount subtracted. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.

Example: {value} off!

fields.label: Shop page - discount percentage/amount subtracted text for variable product
fields.name: wctbp_shop_page_discount_percentage_variable_product_text
fields.instructions:
Shows the discount applied/amount subtracted (if any) to the product after the product price. {value} is the place holder for the max discount percentage applied/amount subtracted. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.

Example: up to {value} off!

fields.label: Shop & Cart pages - Saved amount label
fields.name: wctbp_shop_and_cart_pages_saved_amount_label
fields.instructions: Label used on product table to display the amout of saved money give by the sum of the cart discounts and product price reductions. NOTE: if you are using WPML, use the WPML language selector to switch language and localize text.
